alert.note: Alert for Susitna Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 9:37AM AKST until February 23 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Highest amounts from Talkeetna north. * WHERE...Susitna Valley. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 9 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will continue into this evening. Snow may intensity for a few hours this afternoon. 2 to 4 inches of snow is expected for the south and western Susitna Valley, including Willow and Skwentna, with 6 to 12 inches of snow expected farther north from Talkeetna to Broad Pass.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
